title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' in the context menu until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions in the context menu are distributed randomly and it is not clear why some actions are included while others are not. All actions should be easily reachable from the editor, without requiring users to switch views.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is missing from the context menu.
SR:
1. Open the editor and select some text.
2. Right-click on the selected text to open the context menu.
3. Verify if the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is present in the context menu.
4. If the action is missing, switch to the Outline view and check if it is available there.
